name: Alexander A. Sherstov
content: Alexander Sherstov Alexander Sherstov Professor Computer Science Department UCLA Home Research Teaching Contact I am a professor at UCLA, in the Department of Computer Science. My area of specialization is theoretical computer science. I am particularly interested in computational complexity theory, computational learning theory, and quantum computing. Prior to joining UCLA, I was a postdoctoral researcher at Microsoft Research New England (2009â€“2011). I completed my Ph.D. in computer science at the University of Texas at Austin in 2009, under the direction of Adam Klivans. Research Statement (May 2022)
